original_text: The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination: how much more, when he bringeth it with a wicked mind?
korean_text: 악인의 제물은 본래 가증하거든 하물며 악한 뜻으로 드리는 것이랴

sentences.original_text: The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination
when he bringeth it with a wicked mind
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 악한 마음으로 가져올 때에는 얼마나 더하랴
